Package com.github.robtimus.os.windows.registry

package com.github.robtimus.os.windows.registry
Provides classes and interfaces for working with the Windows registry.
  • Class
    Description
    BinaryValue
    A representation of binary registry values.
    DWordValue
    A representation of DWORD registry values.
    FullResourceDescriptorValue
    A representation of full resource descriptor registry values.
    InvalidRegistryHandleException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to access a registry key using a handle that is no longer valid.
    LinkValue
    A representation of link registry values.
    LocalRegistry
    A representation of the local Windows registry.
    MultiStringValue
    A representation of multi-string registry values.
    NoneValue
    Represents registry values with no defined value types.
    NoSuchRegistryKeyException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to access a registry key that does not exist.
    NoSuchRegistryValueException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to access a registry value that does not exist.
    QWordValue
    A representation of QWORD registry values.
    Registry
    A representation of a local or remote Windows registry.
    RegistryAccessDeniedException
    Thrown when access is denied for a requested operation.
    RegistryException
    Thrown when an error occurred while trying to access or modify the Windows registry.
    RegistryFeature
    An enumeration over optional registry features.
    RegistryKey
    A representation of registry keys.
    RegistryKey.Attributes
    Attributes associated with a registry key.
    RegistryKey.HandleOption
    An enumeration over the possible options for opening Windows registry handles.
    RegistryKey.TraverseOption
    An enumeration over the possible options for traversing a registry key.
    RegistryKeyAlreadyExistsException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to create a registry key that already exists.
    RegistryValue
    A representation of registry values.
    RegistryValue.Filter
    A filter for registry values.
    RemoteRegistry
    A representation of a Windows registry on a remote machine.
    RemoteRegistry.Connector
    An object that can be used to connect to the registry on a remote machine.
    ResourceListValue
    A representation of resource list registry values.
    ResourceRequirementsListValue
    A representation of resource requirements registry values.
    SettableRegistryValue
    A representation of registry values that can be set.
    StringValue
    A representation of string registry values.
    Transaction
    A representation of transactions for working with the Windows registry.
    Transaction.Status
    The possible transaction statuses.
    TransactionalState
    The possible transactional states.
    TransactionalState.Action<X extends Throwable>
    A transactional action.
    TransactionalState.Callable<R, X extends Throwable>
    A transactional action that returns a result.
    TransactionException
    Thrown when an error occurred while trying to use a transaction.
    TransactionNotAllowedException
    Thrown when a transactional state that does not allow transactions is used with a current transaction.
    TransactionOption
    An option that can be used when creating transactions.
    TransactionRequiredException
    Thrown when a mandatory transactional state is used without a current transaction.
